name: The Prideful Goat
description: A collaboration between SSW, Whiskey Pete, and Bourbon Real Talk. This 15-Year Kentucky Bourbon Whiskey offers smooth yet bold flavors to be enjoyed anywhere with anyone. So take a leap and discover the complex and beautiful sceneries of The Prideful Goat. Stand tall. Stand Prideful.
tastingNotes: All cherries and fruit with a sweet but spicy, peppery finish
